CustomField.formula: HYPERLINK(SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE("https://production-backend.heyjobs.de/admin/purchases/new?company_id=" & TEXT(Account.txtCompanyId__c) & "&" & "invoice_recipient=" & Account.Contact_First_Name__c & "%20" & Account_Contact_Last_Name__c & "&" & "invoice_recipient_email=" & Opportunity__r.Billing_Email__c &"&"& "invoice_street=" & Opportunity__r.Billing_Street__c &"&"& "invoice_postcode_and_city=" &Opportunity__r.Billing_Zip_Postal_Code__c &"%20"& Opportunity__r.Billing_City__c & "&"& SUBSTITUTE("invoice_company =" &Opportunity__r.Bill_To_Name__c,"&","%26") & "&"& "purchase_date=" &TEXT(Opportunity__r.dateTimestampContractreceived__c) &"&"& "paid_budget=" &TEXT( Opportunity__r.Amount) &"&"& "goodwill_budget=" &TEXT( Opportunity__r.BonusBudget__c) &"&"& "opportunity_id=" & CASESAFEID(Opportunity__c) &"&"& "product_type=" & LOWER(TEXT(Opportunity__r.Product_Type__c)) &"&"& "marketing_budget_share=" &TEXT(Opportunity__r.Type ), " ", "%20"),"ä", "%C3%A4"), "ö","%C3%B6"),"ü","%C3%BC"),"ß","%C3%9F"), "Backend Purchase Link")
CustomField.label: Backend Purchase link
